ygData.subject: Re: what next?
ygData.msgSnippet: I suggest that you just sharpen weapons till 27 (maybe 26), at higher levels they have to be biggers weapons (ie. skill of 25-26 would need 2h swords, halbred,
ygData.messageBody:
I suggest that you just sharpen weapons till 27 (maybe 26), at higher levels
they have to be biggers weapons (ie. skill of 25-26 would need 2h swords,
halbred, or other "large" weapons.) then you can make skewers, but I heard
[skalers] (scalers?) are cheaper, and more effective.


>From: Keldros@...
>Reply-To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] what next?
>Date: Fri, 25 Jun 1999 17:08:54 EDT
>
>From: Keldros@...
>
>I am at smithing 24. I have been making studs but only about a 30 - 40 %
>success rate. Should I be making these or is it too early for them? I mean
>is
>there something else I can do and maybe get a better success rate while
>still
>taking up my skill?
>
>Thanks
